## R Markdown

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(InsectSprays, aes(x=spray, y=count)) + geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = 'Insecticide Effectiveness by Type', x = 'Type of Insecticide', y = 'Effectiveness')

ggplotly(p)
```
